documentation.text:
@dev Fetches the permission for if an owner has allowed the inscription at inscriptionId
 If this value is false, front end must not display the inscription.

attributes.text:
@dev Fetches the permission for if an owner has allowed the inscription at inscriptionId
 If this value is false, front end must not display the inscription.

addInscription((address,uint256,uint256).details: Adds an inscription on-chain to the specified nft

params.addWhiteList: The inscription meta data ID associated with the inscription
params.data: The tokenId of the NFT that is being signed
params.sig: An optional URI, to not set this, pass the empty string ""  Requirements: - `tokenId` The user calling this method must own the `tokenId` at `nftAddress` or has been approved - `URIId` URIId must exist

getInscriptionData(bytes32).details: Fetches the inscription location at inscriptionID  Requirements: - `inscriptionID` inscriptionID must exist

getInscriptionURI(bytes32).details: Fetches the inscriptionURI at inscriptionID  Requirements: - `inscriptionID` inscriptionID must exist

getNFTLocation(bytes32).details: Fetches the inscription location at inscriptionID  Requirements: - `inscriptionID` inscriptionID must exist

getPermission(bytes32,address).details: Fetches the permission for if an owner has allowed the inscription at inscriptionId If this value is false, front end must not display the inscription.
